summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the plasma collision utilities in the formulary, checking numerical accuracy, unit handling, array support, symmetry, reference values, and proper warning/error behavior for functions such as Coulomb logarithm, dimensionless parameters, collision frequencies, collision lengths, resistivity, and mobility.
business_intent: Guarantee the scientific correctness and robustness of collision-related calculations in the plasma physics library, supporting reliable research and development workflows.
